title: Groovy Support
description: Groovy is a powerful, optionally typed and dynamic language, with static-typing and static compilation capabilities, for the Java platform aimed at multiplying developers productivity thanks to a concise, familiar and easy to learn syntax.

featureset.title: Why replacing IvyScript
featureset.description:
• Not state of the art (no closures, no generics)
  • A lot of Code, hard to maintain, hard to add features
  • Bad Performance

featureset.title: </br>Why Groovy
featureset.description:
Groovy = IvyScript

  • - boilder plate code
  • + closures
  • + Better performance
Groovy in Eclipse
  • + Better Editor
  • + Debugging Support
  • + Refactoring Support

features.title: Very similar to IvyScript
features.text1: But with a lot of enhancements and Closures
